definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Love is cleaning the pieces of ice off his raincoat.
sentences.chinese: 爱是清掉他雨衣上的冰片儿。

sentences.english: The Blumea balsamifera powder is a crude product of borneol.
sentences.chinese: 艾粉是艾纳香制取冰片的粗级产品。

sentences.english: The result verified the meridian distribution of Borneol in TCM theory.
sentences.chinese: 结果证实了中医中冰片归心经的论述。

sentences.english: The transmucosal absorption of insulin is effectively enhanced by borneol.
sentences.chinese: 冰片对胰岛素透口腔粘膜吸收有显著促进作用。

sentences.english: It was one of mechanisms for borneol opening BBB.
sentences.chinese: 这是冰片开放血脑屏障的作用机制之一。

sentences.english: Carbomer and borneol significantly increase the absorptive rate in intestine.
sentences.chinese: 卡波姆和冰片对它们在小肠的吸收有显著促进作用。

sentences.english: Borneol is an effective constituent in lots of active Chinese drugs.
sentences.chinese: 冰片作为常用的中药，是多种中成药的有效成分之一。

sentences.english: AIM To establish the quality control method for menthol and borneol in capsicum rheumatism plaster.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立辣椒风湿膏中薄荷脑与冰片的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: The spectral characteristics of borneol in near infrared region were investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章对冰片在近红外区域的光谱特性进行了实验研究。

definition: the larva of silkworm with batrytis
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
